name: Revenge of Quaternius
description:
Fight your way through a gauntlet of suspiciously-similar looking enemies in order to escape back to the title screen. Make enemies walk into spikes! Make archers kill their friends! Die a million times and get frustrated!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - Move

Mouse1 - Attack

Mouse2/Alt - Gimbal lock

Charge your gimbal lock ability by defeating an enemy. After activating, click on an enemy to target it, and click again to force it to move in the specified direction.
